body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.  
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of personal information.  
Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand.
The conversation should be at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time and end the conversation.
Return the conversation formatted like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is William Hayes, and I'm with Green Paws Veterinary Clinic. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Joyce. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling disappointed with the quality of one of your products.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm really sorry to hear that. Could you please tell me which product you're referring to?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's the HeartBeats Heartworm Prevention Chewables for dogs.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for specifying. May I also ask for your pet's name and the batch number of the product? This will help us investigate the issue.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my dog's name is Max, and the batch number is FIVE TWO SEVEN EIGHT.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Joyce. We'll look into this immediately and follow up with you on our findings. In the meantime, is there anything else I can help you with?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that would be all for now. Thank you, William.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Joyce. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We value your feedback and are here to ensure you and Max are happy with our services. Have a great day!
